messages.welcome:
Welcome to Correlation Center Bot!

{{description}}

Type /help to see all commands.

Use the keyboard below for quick access.
messages.description: The Correlation Center is a system inspired by Jacque Fresco ideas. It ensures that all needs are satisfied using available resources. In short, it's a system to manage needs and resources.
messages.help:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/get - Add a get
/gets - List your gets
/give - Add a give
/gives - List your gives
/cancel - Cancel current pending action
messages.helpGroup:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/get - Add a get
/give - Add a give
/cancel - Cancel current pending action
messages.promptGet: Please send the description of your get as your next message.
messages.promptGive: Please send the description of your give as your next message.
messages.getAdded: Your get was published at {{channel}}. You can manage your gets in private messages of @CorrelationCenterBot.
messages.giveAdded: Your give was published at {{channel}}. You can manage your gives in private messages of @CorrelationCenterBot.
messages.getAddedPrivate: Your get was published at {{channel}}. Use the "My gets" button or /gets to view and manage your gets.
messages.giveAddedPrivate: Your give was published at {{channel}}. Use the "My gives" button or /gives to view and manage your gives.

limitGetsPerDay: You have already posted {{count}} gets in the last 24 hours. Limit is {{limit}} per day (rolling 24h window).
limitGivesPerDay: You have already posted {{count}} gives in the last 24 hours. Limit is {{limit}} per day (rolling 24h window).
actionCancelled: Your current action has been canceled.
noPendingAction: You have no pending action to cancel.
anonymousNotAllowed: Only personal accounts can create gets or gives.
